title: Understanding JIT
text: Just-in-time (JIT) inventory systems focus on reducing waste and improving efficiency. Think about what costs are associated with holding inventory.

title: Inventory Costs
text: Consider how reducing the amount of inventory on hand can impact costs related to storage, insurance, and obsolescence.

title: Main Advantage of JIT
text: The primary benefit of a JIT system is that it reduces the costs associated with holding and managing inventory.
